That's what I thought too! But what the heck, if that's too powerful for 
them, then maybe techno-organics are worthy of being in the universe at 
all!!
So the thing is that since the key and the reformatting cannon (this is 
mostly addressed to council members) are going offline and won't be used 
ever again, their use being of creating suitable ground support for a 
techno-organic base, do I keep the storyline going as I planned or do I 
change it?
